column5: The Perch boasts a 30-mile view of the stunning hill country. Enjoy your morning coffee and wine as you relax on your deck. The space is a newly renovated studio with a king-sized bed, full bath, living area and fully- stocked kitchen. For additional guests, The Nest is available for rent as well! If you are planning a special event, book the Panorama Great Room that may be leased to accommodate up to 40 people. We are just minutes from Wimberley Square, Blue Hole, and Wimberley Market Days.
column8: Stunning Hill Country Views from The Perch
